I think that with some changes, this library could work also from outside CRM right? this could be a great solution to develop Windows 8 solutions connected to CRM.

what do you think about it?

regards and keep doing this great job! (and thank you!)

Hi there.

thanks very much for the kind words and glad to know you like the library.

In an intranet environment, I normally do a trick to include PageData.js in my project which could be generated by the tool xrm.pagescriptprojecttemplate from SDK.

This PageData.js file will have the CRM server URL which could be consumed by the XrmServiceToolkit to develop using Soap service or Rest service. This allows you to
  1. Develop a website in the internal network to consume CRM data
  2. Debug your CRM web resource solution through your visual studio
    ....(much more as you can imagine)
I, however, still have issues when a cross domain issue is related (SSL connection or CRM online, etc)

Would love to hear from you if you have an idea to make the library to support cross domain and apply authentication

Happy Coding,
Jaimie
